Huntington_Park.Bethlehem Baptist Church (Los Angeles):
The Bethlehem Baptist Church is a building in Los Angeles designed by architect R.M. Schindler, and built in 1944. Located in the Central-Alameda district of Los Angeles. on the corner of Compton Avenue and 49th Street, it is the only example of a church designed by Schindler, and "the lone example of Modernist architecture to cross Los Angeles economic and racial boundaries in the era of Jim Crow housing covenants."


== History ==
In 2009, Bethlehem Baptist was declared a Historic-Cultural Monument by the Los Angeles City Council.
